pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lince Torrent is a torrent client based on rb_libtorrent, and gtkmm. It aims to be a light and full featured client. Some of its highlighted features are: * UPnP / NAT-PMP port forwarding support. * Encryption support (compatible with Azureus). * Multiple simultaneous downloads / uploads. * DHT (trackerless) support. * uTorrent Peer eXchange support (PeX). * Selective download of files in a torrent * Torrent trackers edition. * System tray integration * Unicode support * Connection though a proxy * IP Filtering similar to the one in eMule
